amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that any prohibition on or limitation to EPA's Clean Air Act authority contained in the bill would not apply to any action EPA could take to reduce demand for oil.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-54 to ensure that any prohibition on or limitation to EPA's Clean Air Act authority contained in the bill would not apply to any action EPA could take to reduce demand for oil.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 266 (Roll no. 238).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Markey.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 266 (Roll no. 238).
